item.description:
July 2009

Agenda
* Introductions
* Speaker

Speaker
Adam Baratz will present The Echo Nest API ( http://developer.echo... ), developed with Django. The talk will be setup as a case study on the design, with excursions into how various advanced Python/Django magic (decorators, class-based views, custom model managers, using Django forms to generate API documentation) was utilized in the implementation.


Location
Betahouse, 13 Magazine St, Central Sq. If you are coming by car, you can park in the Green Street garage for $5. If coming by T, take the Red Line to Central Square and walk two blocks to 13 Magazine St. Buzz suite #2 and then walk up the stairs two flights.
item.name: Cambridge Django July 2009 Meetup
